item.description:
Join the rhythm of the sacred drumming circle. Dance to the beat of the drums and sing with the music of the moment. We join together to embody the pulsation of life.

Drumming is a great way to build community, to create a sense of togetherness and belonging, and to learn to listen and respond. It is also a way to let go of the cares of the day and allow your body to flow into the rhythm of the moment with no agenda - only the being-ness of now.

We welcome you into our circle: be you dancer, singer, or drummer. Come step into the rhythm together.
item.name: Boston Drum Circle
